alert.note: Alert for Chinle Valley; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 25 at 1:49AM MST until February 26 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM MST SUNDAY ABOVE 5500 FEET... * WHAT...Expect snow showers to develop from west to east during the day Sunday. Snow levels will initially be above 6500 feet early Sunday morning, but will quickly fall. Some blowing and drifting snow is also possible, as southwest winds gust from 35 to 50 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 5500 feet near Chinle, Eagar- Springerville, Kayenta and Saint Johns. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 6 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage. Snow forecast from 6 AM Sunday to 6 PM Sunday: Chinle 0 to 1 inches Eagar-Sprgrvlle 1 to 2 inches Kayenta 0 to 1 inches Saint Johns 0 to 1 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Chinle Valley; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County
